title: Round 6: Anything Related to the Colour Purple

question: Which legendary rock band shares its name with a shade of purple?
Which writer published the novel ‘The Color Purple’ in 1982?
Which artist's 1984 album features the title track ‘Purple Rain’?
Which U.S. military decoration is awarded to service members wounded or killed in action?
Historically, due to its rarity and cost, purple dye became associated with which social class?
Which purple dinosaur featured on a children’s TV show is known for the song ‘I Love You’?
Which purple flower is a staple in aromatherapy due to its soothing fragrance?
Which fruit’s name is used as a common term for a deep shade of purple, especially in Europe?
Which Disney villain, characterized by a purple color palette and magical staff, appears in ‘Sleeping Beauty’?
Which Ghost-type Pokémon from Generation I is predominantly purple and evolves from Haunter?
